Summary: Looked like a big car bumper
trends: There have been no other sightings in Amherst
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out in my garage working on my truck when I saw a bright light outside , so I figured a few of my buddies were there so I opened up the big door and there was no one there and no lights . Then I was a little tripped out so I start to walk back in the garage and I see these 4 bright lights in the sky across the road at my uncles, and as a teenager I thought it was pretty cool so I took out my iPhone to take a video of it and just as I got my video opened my battery went from 94% to 0% . So I slowly backed myself in my garage and as I walked back the lights would slowly get closer and it was freaking me out . I went back inside and tried to forget about it and I was doing something under the truck and I thought I seen something run past the door really quick so I grabbed the shot gun and went to the door when I got there their were what looked to be like grizzly bear tracks they were huge so I slowly walked around to the back of the garage and I followed the tracks right to the back door where they stopped but the door was looked and the pad lock was still on it. Then I was starting to think I was going crazy. I was standing there when the bright lights came back on a d started moving by my uncles and they went down into the gully way back behind my house , so I hoped on my ski doo picked the shot gun up and went down the field when I got there , their was nothing there and I was tired and confused so I came back up to the house and went to sleep. When I got up the next morning and went outside , there were no tracks other then might but down the field the was about 8 big spots of snow that were red and black and about 5 m in size . Ill never forget that night but I want some kind of explanation of what it is ?!?
